p: The worldwide use of ART therapy is expanding [ 12, 25â€“ 27]. With this increase, it is important to identify differences in immunological progression by gender, age, and ethnicity, as specific populations may require subtype-specific monitoring and guidelines for treatment [ 1, 31]. Such estimates of CD4+ T cell trajectories are essential for public health models as they can predict the course of an HIV epidemic [ 20, 24, 32]. In this study, to enhance the understanding of T cell characteristics and disease progression in newly diagnosed HIV/AIDS patients in Yunnan, a comprehensive study was conducted that included patient samples collected across the entire province from 2015 to 2018. The aim of this study was to provide a meaningful reference for AIDS prevention and control strategies in Yunnan.
